title: Crime Alert 10.05.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.05.21
description:
Electrician charged with murder after a fight with his supervisor. Convicted felon posts a picture of an item to sell, and forgets about bag a meth in the picture.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
